Class Factorization<U,I>

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.mf.Factorization<U,I>
  • Type Parameters:
    U - type of the users
    I - type of the items
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ItemIndex<I>, UserIndex<U>, FastItemIndex<I>, FastUserIndex<U>

extends Object
implements FastItemIndex<I>, FastUserIndex<U>
